83A10008 80010010
7C0803A6 3821000C
4E800020

Inverts the player's gravity at will.

Support Status:
 + Battle (Offline)
 + Battle (Online)
 + Grand Prix
 - Menu
 + VS Race (Offline)
 + VS Race (Online)
 + Time Trials
 - Wii Remote
 - Wii Remote + Nunchuck
 - Wii U Classic Controller
 + Wii U GamePad

How to use:
As long as the specified button activator is being pressed, the code will remain active.

Activator(s):

[Wii U GamePad]
Enable: R

Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
